review.author: Analyst (Codex)
review.findings: Evidence Ledger query contract tests (12 tests). TC-ENV: alias normalization, validation, edge derivation. TC-Q1: trace chain reconstruction, legacy-correlation lookup, limit+includeEdges. TC-Q2: failure path composed helper. TC-Q3: journey view. All tests exercise real Phase A APIs (store + ingest). Fixtures use deterministic data. No source changes â€” test-only addition. Suite: 111 suites, 3324 tests.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
